signature: protected Class<?> fetchClass(final String className) throws ClassNotFoundException
name: fetchClass
javadoc:
/**
 * Fetches a class by its fully qualified name.
 *
 * @param className the fully qualified name of the class to fetch
 * @return the loaded class, or null if the class cannot be found
 * @throws ClassNotFoundException if the class cannot be found
 */

signature: public synchronized String lookup(final String key)
name: lookup
javadoc:
/**
 * Looks up a constant value in the cache or resolves it from the underlying data source.
 *
 * @param key The key of the constant value to look up. It should be in the format "namespace:field".
 * @return The resolved constant value as a string, or null if not found or an error occurred.
 * @throws Exception If an error occurs while resolving the field from the underlying data source.
 */

signature: protected Object resolveField(final String className, final String fieldName) throws ReflectiveOperationException
name: resolveField
javadoc:
/**
 * Resolves a field of a specified class.
 *
 * @param className  the name of the class to resolve the field from
 * @param fieldName  the name of the field to resolve
 * @return          the resolved field value, or null if the class is not found
 * @throws ReflectiveOperationException if an error occurs while accessing the field
 */
